main_text:
Philosophical Lessons
5. Philosophical Lessons

Having considered several major families of responses to the logical
and semantic challenges posed by the sorites, it is worth reflecting
upon some of the broader philosophical issues that the problem raises.
Since the deeply puzzling phenomenon of vagueness manifests itself
first and foremost as a linguistic phenomenon, it is unsurprising that
the responses variously intersect with problems concerning meaning,
truth and reference.
